scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.server: unset PREFIX npm_config_prefix && export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm use 20 && cd server && node index.js
scripts.client: unset PREFIX npm_config_prefix && export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm use 20 && cd client && npm run dev
